likeOlderSibling: You had a friend that was like an older brother to you.
You had a friend that was like an older sister to you.
likeYoungerSibling: You had a friend that was like an younger brother to you.
You had a friend that was like an younger sister to you.
mentor: You found a mentor to guide you through life's obstacles.
coworker: You and a co-worker became close friends.
oldLover: On chance, you ran into an old lover and became friends again.
oldEnemy: You enocuntered a past enemy and resolved your differences. You became good friends.
relative: One of your cousins came to stay with you. You became friends.
childhoodFriend: A friend from childhood returned one day. You two picked up where you left off.
commonInterest: You meet a friend playing tennis.
exFriend: You get into a fight with a friend.
relativeEnemy: You and your father get into a heated arguement.
childhoodEnemy: A childhood rival makes trouble for you.
employer: You get into trouble with your boss.
employee: Someone that works for you crosses you.
gangMember: You and a gang member become enemies.
coworkerEnemy: A rivalry starts with a co-worker
governmentOfficial: A government official set their sights on you.
happyLoveAffair: You had a happy love affair.
loverDiedInAccident: Your lover died in an accident.
loverVanished: Your lover vanished without a trace.
didNotWork: You had an okay relationship, but it wasn't meant to be.
goalConflict: You two had different goals in life and went your seperate ways.
loverKidnapped: Your lover was kidnapped and never seen again.
loverInsane: Your lover went insane and had to be locked away.
loverKilled: Your lover was killed in cold blood.
stolenByRival: Your lover was stolen away by a rival.
loverImprisoned: Your lover was arrested and locked up.
friendsAndFamilyHateYou: Your lover's family and friends hated you.
romanticRival: A rival lover put strain on your relationship.
separated: You were separated during a war.
coupleFight: You had an unhealthy relationship and fought constantly.
jealousy: You were jealous and ruined the relationship.
cheating: You got greedy and cheated on your lover.
cultureConflict: You loved eachother, but the cultural differences were too large to ignore.
